definition[0]: something, especially a stone with writing on it, that reminds people of someone who has died
example[0]: An appeal has been launched to build a lasting memorial to the composer.
example[1]: The hospital was built as a memorial to King Edward VII.
definition[1]: an achievement that reminds people of someone who has died
example[2]: The garden is a memorial to one of the finest Victorian gardeners.
definition[2]: done or made in order to remind people of someone who has died
example[3]: A memorial service will be held at 7 pm on Saturday.
